sources.title: Grave of the Vampire
sources.description: William Smith tracks down his father, a vampire who raped his mother. The IMDB entry is here . The mpeg2 file has nav-packets, so you can load it into DVDAuthorGUI (a free program) to create a DVD to watch on your television.

sources.title: Grave of the Vampire
sources.description: Kroft, a legendary vampire, returns from sleep. Kroft attacks a couple in a graveyard, raping the woman. The child born feeds only on blood from his mother's breast.

sources.title: Grave of the Vampire (1972)
sources.description: A vampire awakens from a long sleep to attack a couple making love in a graveyard. He then rapes the woman, who later gives birth to his son. The newborn infant will only drink blood from his mother's breast. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/grave-of-the-vampire-1972/

sources.title: Grave Of The Vampire (1972) ｜ William Smith
sources.description: Kroft, a legendary vampire, returns from sleep. Kroft attacks a couple in a graveyard. A child is born and feeds only on blood from his mother's breast.

sources.title: Grave Of The Vampire high quality HD version
sources.description: The son (William Smith) of an old and powerful vampire (Michael Pataki) seeks his father out and finds him teaching a college course.

metadata.Plot: A young man, born of a rape committed by a legendary vampire against a living woman, vows to locate and vanquish his undead father.
metadata.Actors: William Smith, Michael Pataki, Kitty Vallacher
